room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami
review: Awesome activity for first date. Geneva trail is very hard. We made it to the last room but never would have figured out how to get out after being shown how.

room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami
review: Hands down the best escape room in town! I had the pleasure of trying to escape the cabin. It was the perfect combination of fun and challenging. Our group of seven managed to escape with 3 minutes to spare. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Geneva Trail" by Evolution Escape Rooms in Miami
review: The attention to detail on the Diner and the Cabin rooms are incredible! I went with family and friends and had a blast. I can't wait for the third escape room to open.
